segments.text: I’m disgusted by how messy this kitchen is becoming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and no one is doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, and it’s really unpleasant to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, completely oblivious to everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall, and it’s going to be a huge mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for a cookie, not caring about anything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is just so unpleasant and avoidable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would just clean up the water before it gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children should know better than to do this right now.
segments.speaker: PAR
